name: Pigeon Poop Clicker
description:
This game is a microgame that was developed as part of a team university project. It is a prototype and was developed over a two week period from 9/02/2022 to 23/02/2022.

You play as a pigeon in a suburban area and can click on cars with the left mouse button to poop on them. There are so many cars and only 10 seconds to poop on them! 

Hit as many cars as you can for a high score. If you can beat the developer's high score of 3800, congratulations!

Created by:

Benjamin West

Lachlan Phillips

Kelly Stragalas
